page.title: 01Elsworth & Papworth Everard
page.content:
Villages of Elsworth and Papworth Everard in the County of Cambridgeshire.
This is primarily a rural area but for different reasons the villages are not greatly affected. {Elsworth,}with a population of 650, is a beautiful village with many old houses, some dating from Tudor times. It is essentially a commuter village. It has a varied and interesting natural history. {Papworth Everard}takes most of its features from the Papworth Village Settlement, which was set up to care for tuberculosis patients in 1918. Papworth also has international recognition for its hospital, which specialises in cardiac cases, and is one of the world's leading heart transplant hospitals.
